Description: Returns the first day of a week in the given locale.
Returns the minimal number of days required in the first week of a year.

Method: getDisplayName(String calendarType, int field, int value, int style, Locale locale)
Description: Returns the string representation (display name) of the calendar field value in the given style and locale.

Method: getDisplayNames(String calendarType, int field, int style, Locale locale)
Description: Returns a Map containing all string representations (display names) of the Calendar field in the given style and locale and their corresponding field values.
Returns a name for the currency that is appropriate for display to the user.
Gets the symbol of the given currency code for the specified locale.
Returns a localized name for the given IETF BCP47 region code (either ISO 3166 country code or UN M.49 area codes) and the given locale that is appropriate for display to the user.
Returns a localized name for the given IETF BCP47 language code and the given locale that is appropriate for display to the user.
Returns a localized name for the given IETF BCP47 script code and the given locale that is appropriate for display to the user.
Returns a localized name for the given variant code and the given locale that is appropriate for display to the user.
Returns an array of all locales for which this locale service provider can provide localized objects or names.
Returns true if the given locale is supported by this locale service provider.

Method: getDisplayName(String ID, boolean daylight, int style, Locale locale)
Description: Returns a name for the given time zone ID that's suitable for presentation to the user in the specified locale.

Method: getGenericDisplayName(String ID, int style, Locale locale)
Description: Returns a generic name for the given time zone ID that's suitable for presentation to the user in the specified locale.
